channel.title: masters-log on Welcome!
channel.description: Recent content in masters-log on Welcome!

item.title: Master's Log - 0
item.description: While on the bus a month ago, I thought it would be cool to keep a written blog of my experiences while completing my masters. This would be an on-going “series” of posts that would share what I’m working on, any tools I’m using, my workflow, organization system or anything of the sort. I’d like to make a post every few weeks (but let’s see if that happens). Current Plan I don’t start it until January so this plan is completely based on speaking to other grad students and reading online.
